verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> You and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary:<s%> and you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H3550>priesthood.<s%>

And your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H7126>bring<s%> you with you, that they may be <S%H3867>joined<s%> to you, and <S%H8334>minister<s%> to you: but you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you shall minister <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>witness.<s%>

And they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H4931>charge,<s%> and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle:<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> they shall not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1571><s%> they, nor you <S%H1571>also,<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And they shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> to you, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle:<s%> and a <S%H376>stranger<s%> <S%H2114><s%> shall not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to you.

And you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> that there be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And I, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> to you they are <S%H5414>given<s%> as a <S%H4979>gift<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

Therefore you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> with you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H3550>priest's<s%> office for <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil;<s%> and you shall <S%H5647>serve:<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> your <S%H3550>priest's<s%> office to you as a <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H4979>gift:<s%> and the <S%H376>stranger<s%> <S%H2114><s%> that <S%H7131>comes<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I also have <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of my <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> things of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> to you have I <S%H5414>given<s%> them by reason of the <S%H4888>anointing,<s%> and to your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> by an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> shall be your of the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, reserved from the <S%H784>fire:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of theirs, <S%H3605>every<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of theirs, and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering of theirs, and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering of theirs <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H7725>render<s%> to me, shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> for you and for your <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
In the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> it; <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it: it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to you.

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is yours; the <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> of their <S%H4976>gift,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8573>wave<s%> offerings of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them to you, and to your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and to your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with you, by a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is <S%H2889>clean<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it.

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and of the <S%H1715>wheat,<s%> the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of them <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H5414>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> them have I <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

And <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> is <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>ripe<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> shall be yours; <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is <S%H2889>clean<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it.
Every <S%H3605>thing<s%> <S%H2764>devoted<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be yours.

<S%H3605>Every<s%> thing that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7126>bring<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> whether it be of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H929>beasts,<s%> shall be yours: <S%H389>nevertheless<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> shall you surely <S%H6299>redeem,<s%> and the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%> shall you <S%H6299>redeem.<s%>

And those that are to be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall you <S%H6299>redeem,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> for the <S%H3701>money<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs.<s%>

But the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of a <S%H7794>cow,<s%> or the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of a <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of a <S%H5795>goat,<s%> you shall not <S%H6299>redeem;<s%> they are <S%H6944>holy:<s%> you shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> their <S%H2459>fat<s%> for an offering made by fire, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of them shall be yours, as the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and as the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> are yours.

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7311>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> you, and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with you, by a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> it is a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to you and to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> with you.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> You shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in their <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H1961>have<s%> any <S%H2506>part<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them: I am your <S%H2506>part<s%> and your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tenth<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> for their <S%H5656>service<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5647>serve,<s%> even the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> must the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from now <S%H5750>on<s%> <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> lest they <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2399>sin,<s%> and <S%H4191>die.<s%>

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> that <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

But the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7311>offer<s%> as an <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H5159>inherit:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8432>Among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you from them for your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> then you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> up an <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> of it for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even a <S%H4643>tenth<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> of the <S%H4643>tithe.<s%>

And this your <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> shall be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> to you, as though it were the <S%H1715>corn<s%> of the threshing <S%H1637>floor,<s%> and as the <S%H4395>fullness<s%> of the wine <S%H3342>press.<s%>

<S%H3651>Thus<s%> you <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> an <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3947>receive<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> thereof the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

Out of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4979>gifts<s%> you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>best<s%> thereof, <S%H853>even<s%> the <S%H4720>hallowed<s%> part thereof out of it.

Therefore you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, When you have <S%H7311>heaved<s%> the <S%H2459>best<s%> thereof from it, then it shall be <S%H2803>counted<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the threshing <S%H1637>floor,<s%> and as the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the wine <S%H3342>press.<s%>

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> you and your <S%H1004>households:<s%> for it is your <S%H7939>reward<s%> for your <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> by <S%H5921>reason<s%> of it, when you have <S%H7311>heaved<s%> from it the <S%H2459>best<s%> of it: <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H2490>pollute<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> you <S%H4191>die.<s%>
